Abidol is a broad-spectrum antiviral drug. By inhibiting the fusion between the influenza virus and host cells, it can inhibit virus replication. It has been used to prevent/treat both SARS and Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS). According to an online report, Abidol in the concentration range of 10-30Î¼M not only inhibited COVID-19 duplication, it also significantly reduced the pathological effect of the virus
9 . A randomized multi-center controlled clinical trial wtih Abidol in patients with COVID-19 has started in Xiangya Hospital in China, which has been registered in the US clinical trial database
10 .
